attributes.action: Ask ITV to bring back “Spitting Image” with the current cast of politicians
attributes.background: ITV are missing a golden opportunity to create great merriment and mirth throughout the UK with the current cast of political characters representing us in Parliament. Could they PLEASE consider bringing the series back, not least to educate an entire generation who missed it first time round.

rejection.details: This would be a decision for ITV and not the UK Government or Parliament.
